How it worksSimple, profitable, safe

1

Select object

Get complete and reliable information about the investment object, its profitability, owner and rating;

Learn more
2

Invest now

Through a secure nominal account in rubles or in foreign currency from only $ 100.

Learn more
3

Receive dividends

Monthly with a yield of 16% per year

Learn more
4

Trade assets

Buy investment shares in investment objects from other users without threshold and restrictions; Sell your investment shares to other users at a profit or discount.

Learn more

Smart platform

By processing thousands of market offers for the sale and lease of commercial real estate, our algorithms use geoanalysis of the environment to assess factors that directly affect the profitability of potential tenants. This allows you to determine the additional potential for the value of the object or to identify its current revaluation.

Learn more

Your safetySafe investments are our priority

Central Bank regulation

Our platform is included in the register of investment platform operators and is fully controlled by the Central Bank of the Russian Federation.

Learn more 

Nominal account

All transactions on the platform go through a dedicated account, owned by the investors themselves.

Learn more 

Reliable projects

All projects on our platform have passed a thorough audit of legal purity and financial attractiveness.

Learn more
